for the military. Michael Vick used the Unequal Chest Protector in the November 7th game against the Indianapolis Colts to protect his ribs. After the game Michael Vick said the Unequal Pad made him feel invincible.'' I'm thrilled to be a part of the Unequal team. I have been wearing Unequal chest protectors, shoulder pads, and thigh pads for much of the late and post-season- resulting in pain-free playing, stated Michael Vick .`` The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal. Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game.''

While lawyers say more celebrities are about to accuse journalists of hacking their phones, Deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg sought to draw a line under the controversy. I don't think this government will miss a beat in terms of just pressing ahead with the plan that we have set out for the next four and a half years, he told the BBC.`` Andy Coulson has been very clear that he was not in any way responsible for phone hacking or had any knowledge of it. I have no reason to disbelieve him.''

gate to halt looting. Zahi Hawass said the Egyptian Museum's collection is now secure from thieves. The greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched firetrucks spray water on the smoldering NDP headquarters.
